Name: The Free Capella Movement
Details: The Free Capella movement began as an anti-Sun-Tzu Liao organization founded by Tormano Liao during the reign of Sun-Tzu's mother Romano Liao. It sought to overthrow the Chancellor of the Capellan Confederation and place Tormano on the throne. It has since evolved to include relief and aid efforts for Capellan citizens.
